what: Industry Financial Metrics Dataset â€” financial_data
title: Industry Financial Metrics Dataset â€” financial_data
text: dataset contains key financial metrics multiple industries 2017-2021 period, sourced Osiris database.

title: Industry Financial Metrics Dataset â€” financial_data
Industry Financial Metrics Dataset â€” financial_data
text: data frame 45 rows 9 columns: year Integer, representing year (2017-2021) industry Character, industry code abbreviation operating_income Numeric, average operating income net_debt Numeric, average net debt current_assets Numeric, average current assets current_ratio Numeric, average current ratio debt_to_assets Numeric, debt--assets ratio (calculated field) profitability_ratio Numeric, profitability--assets ratio (calculated field) industry_label Character, industry name

title: Industry Financial Metrics Dataset â€” financial_data
text: Osiris Global Public Company Database

title: Industry Financial Metrics Dataset â€” financial_data
code: # Load the dataset data(financial_data)  # View data structure str(financial_data) #> tibble [45 Ã— 9] (S3: tbl_df/tbl/data.frame) #>  $ year               : num [1:45] 2017 2017 2017 2017 2017 ... #>  $ industry           : Factor w/ 9 levels "BAS","CSD","CST",..: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 1 ... #>  $ operating_income   : num [1:45] 46259 171717 44481 48678 56833 ... #>  $ net_debt           : num [1:45] 42868 611335 246146 148029 158045 ... #>  $ current_assets     : num [1:45] 109119 389755 163641 208548 164482 ... #>  $ current_ratio      : num [1:45] 7.2 2.99 2.93 5.5 10.38 ... #>  $ debt_to_assets     : num [1:45] 0.393 1.569 1.504 0.71 0.961 ... #>  $ profitability_ratio: num [1:45] 0.424 0.441 0.272 0.233 0.346 ... #>  $ industry_label     : Named chr [1:45] "Basic Materials" "Consumer Services" "Consumer Products" "Energy" ... #>   ..- attr(*, "names")= chr [1:45] "BAS" "CSD" "CST" "ENE" ...  # View first few rows of data head(financial_data) #> # A tibble: 6 Ã— 9 #>    year industry operating_income net_debt current_assets current_ratio #>   <dbl> <fct>               <dbl>    <dbl>          <dbl>         <dbl> #> 1  2017 BAS                46259.   42868.        109119.          7.20 #> 2  2017 CSD               171717.  611335.        389755.          2.99 #> 3  2017 CST                44481.  246146.        163641.          2.93 #> 4  2017 ENE                48678.  148029.        208548.          5.50 #> 5  2017 FIN                56833.  158045.        164482.         10.4  #> 6  2017 HEA                24378.   77405.         93040.          5.99 #> # â„¹ 3 more variables: debt_to_assets <dbl>, profitability_ratio <dbl>, #> #   industry_label <chr>

what: HongyuFinancialAnalysis: Interactive Industry Financial Analysis Platform â€” HongyuFinancialAnalysis-package
title: HongyuFinancialAnalysis: Interactive Industry Financial Analysis Platform â€” HongyuFinancialAnalysis-package
text: Provides interactive industry financial analysis based Osiris dataset. Includes features trend analysis, cross-industry comparison, multidimensional visualization, supports analysis key financial metrics including operating revenue, net debt, current assets, current ratio, etc.

title: HongyuFinancialAnalysis: Interactive Industry Financial Analysis Platform â€” HongyuFinancialAnalysis-package
text: Interactive financial metrics trend analysis Cross-industry financial performance comparison Multidimensional data visualization Intelligent insights suggestion generation
